dj Teresa - International House Music Podcast
http://www.djteresa.net
en-us
2010-2012 dj Teresa
Mixed by dj Teresa - featuring Tech House, Minimal, Techno and Ibiza Underground House Music
dj Teresa
This show features a live mixed set by dj Teresa that showcases the freshest new Tech House, Minimal, Techno and Ibiza Underground House from around the globe.
Focusing on Tech House and highly influenced by the Ballearic Sounds of Ibiza, Teresa delivers a range of House that sounds funky, Latin, mminimal, ungerground and even sometimes hard driving as she moves fluidly from style to style to capture and keep a dancefloor. After completing three tours in Spain in less than 18 months, Teresa has developed a distinct sound that brings the heart of Ibiza to every performance. Teresa has played at five different venues in Ibiza which includes The Orange Corner, Eden Rooms, Viva, Godfathers and the world-renowned Club Es Paradis; and at the Urania Disco in Montijo Spain on the mainland. Visit www.djTeresa.net to learn more or pick up one of her latest releases on beatport, iTunes, Amazon and over 200 other online retailers.
dj Teresa
dj Teresa

I luv NY - So You Like It Hard - mixed by dj Teresa
dj Teresa
I was asked to do a hard tech / techno set for a booking in NYC. I had to start the set with a hats off to my good friend ONIONZ and from there I threw down the hard nasty bass lines, driving tech beats and sexy latin rhythms that I brought home from spain. So tell me ny, is this hard enough? Visit www.djTeresa.net for set lists.
Hard tech / techno set for a booking in NYC. Visit www.djTeresa.net for set lists.
